Item.name: Стеклянная дверь
Item.description: A sliding door with a huge window. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Стеклянная дверь с кнопками
Item.description: A sliding door with a huge window and two integrated buttons.

Item.name: Люк с окном
Item.description: A windowed door, but on the horizontal axis. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Люк с окном и кнопками
Item.description: A windowed door, but on the horizontal axis. Two integrated buttons.

Item.name: Короткая дверь
Item.description: A door with the same size as a hatch. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Короткая дверь с кнопками
Item.description: A door with the same size as a hatch with two integrated buttons.

Item.name: Тяжелая дверь
Item.description: A heavy bulkhead door. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Тяжелая дверь с кнопками
Item.description: A heavy bulkhead door with two integrated buttons.

Item.name: Гермозатвор
Item.description: A heavily armored shutter. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Гермозатвор с кнопками
Item.description: A heavily armored shutter. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Гермозатвор-люк
Item.description: A heavily armored shutter, but on the horizontal axis. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.

Item.name: Гермозатвор-люк с кнопками
Item.description: A heavily armored shutter, but on the horizontal axis. No integrated buttons - has to be wired manually.
